lead_paragraph: Shares of Fitbit fell nearly 14 percent in after-hours trading after it estimated that profit would be below Wall Street expectations.

headline.print_headline: Weak Forecast Sinks Fitbit Shares in After-Hours Trading
headline.main: Poor Prediction Sinks Fitbit Shares in After-Hours Trading

snippet: Shares of Fitbit fell nearly 14 percent in after-hours trading after it estimated that profit would be below Wall Street expectations.
abstract: Fitbit shares fall almost 14 percent following announcement that quarterly profit will fall short of expectations.
